block.tooltip: Triggers when a channel is deleted

generator: _return = '\\nconfig.channelDelete = async channel => { if (channel.guild.id != "' + data.req.body.guild + '") return; try {' + Blockly.JavaScript.statementToCode(block, 'code') + '} catch (e) { onError("' + data.req.body.guild  + '", e); } }'
